entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
